home.description: With the Grease App, you can quickly and easily calculate the initial grease quantity, the manual and automatic relubrication quantity, and the relubrication interval for your Schaeffler bearing.
home.placeholderText: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur dictum ornare bibendum. Duis imperdiet lacinia magna, ut tempor ligula molestie ut. Pellentesque ac suscipit nisi, eu fermentum magna.

meta.title: Grease App
meta.description: The Schaeffler Grease App comfortably assists in selecting the right greasing for a certain bearing application and offers following possibilities: lists recommended grease products (Arcanol), calculates necessary greasing amount and greasing intervals, links to online platform Medias

bearing.subtitle: For which bearing should the calculation be done?
bearing.modelCreationError: Currently a calculation for the bearing {{bearing}} is not possible.

errors.lowerThanEnvironmentTemperature: Cannot be less than environment temperature

tooltip.loads:
The Grease App checks whether the selected bearing can transfer radial or axial loads. If the transmission of loads in the radial or axial direction is not possible, the corresponding load input is deactivated.

For some bearing types, the ratio of axial load to radial load shall be above a certain minimum number. For example, a tapered roller bearing or an angular contact ball bearing can only take up radial load if the axial load is sufficiently high. Please note the general information on the bearing types in the HR1 catalogue.
tooltip.operatingTemperature:
If you do not know the exact operating temperature, please enter the estimated operating temperature. A deviation in the operating temperature usually has the following effect for multi-purpose greases (in case the temperature is above the upper continous temperature limit):

• 15K higher temperature: Reduction of grease operating life by approx. 50%
• 10K higher temperature: Reduction of grease operating life by approx 35%
• 5K higher temperature: Reduction of grease operating life by approx 20%

Please use the function of the Grease App in order to be able to assess the influence of the temperature by its variation.

Please use the function of the Grease App in order to be able to assess the influence of the temperature by its variation.
tooltip.rotationSpeed:
The relative speed is the difference between the inner ring and the outer ring speed:

• When the outer ring is standing still: please enter the inner ring speed.
• When the inner ring is standing still: please enter the outer ring speed.
tooltip.oscillating: Oscillating motion places a greater strain on the grease in the rolling element contact than rotating motion and is therefore taken into account with the correction factor KR in the calculation of the grease operating life and relubrication interval. The correction factor KR gets relevant for oscillating angles less than 180°.
